channel.title: [PI] Fixing yell system
channel.description: Alright, im back haha. Ok i got a problem i have now commands like: ::oyell ::myell ::dyell ::yell ::ayell because in the past there was a problem. When i was owner there were going 4 messages: [Owner] [Admin] [Mod] [Donator] and [Player] But it's irritating me to just type the whole time: Oyell Any thing to fix it?

item.title: [PI] Fixing yell system
item.dc:creator: @moerin moerin
item.description:

Alright, im back haha.
